state_summary: CommanderAI, a CRM and sales prospecting platform, aims to disrupt the waste management industry by providing a more efficient way for companies to sell. The company has raised $5 million in seed funding and plans to expand into adjacent industries.
evidence: David Berg learned about the waste management industry by driving a garbage truck around the country
The industry is dominated by old-school ways of pen and paper, door-to-door knocking, with little technology
CommanderAI's software is better suited to the types of contracts that waste management companies use
Waste management companies sell to small, standalone businesses that might not have an online presence
The company plans to expand outside of waste management and into adjacent industries

metadata.investor_name: 11 Tribes Ventures, Watchfire Ventures, Gaingels, Rad Fund
